description: Construction of 76 dwellings comprising two one-bedroom two-person flats for people with disabilities, 16 one-bedroom two-person flats, 10 two-bedroom three-person flats, 28 two-bedroom four-person flats, 16 three-bedroom four-person flats, four three-bedroom five-person flats, and 340 sq.m. of flexible (A1/A2/A3/D1/D2) commercial floorspace along with ancillary parking and landscaping.
